about_the_game:
This time around metal monolith has appeared in VR.
Try and look for a single iron plate that's full of riddles.
Surely, you won't be able to find it so easily.
Also, try and find an iron cube.
There's absolutely no way that you will find them.
The Metal Monolith Cube contains a hidden, mysterious power.


Functions:
You can use the controller to move freely with the VR space.
Change your direction using the stick or move the direction that you are facing.
You can also jump and run as well.

Game Explanation:
1) Find the Metal Monolith which is located somewhere in the forest
2) Look for the Metal Monolith Cube which is on the ground somewhere


- The forest is infinitely wide, but not unlimited.
- Sometimes the trees get in the way and prevent you from passing
- Even if you fall, you will return back on the ground
